name: Spinners
description:
Master the spin force, conquer all the arenas and win the championship! 🛸
💥Your ship rotates by default, press action button to move forward
(on desktop you can use the "M" key)
💥A direct hit pushes further.
💥Crystals give superpowers.
💥Areas in the floor will switch the spin force.
💥Portals are portals, everybody knows portals.
⭐️ Finish all the arenas in first place and WIN! ⭐️

Assets by Kenney
